BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE PISVIG_CASE_REG_TRN SET STR_CASE_STATUS=2 WHERE STR_COMPLAINT_NUMBER=? and gnum_hospital_code=? and GNUM_ISVALID=1

UPDATE PISVIG_CASE_PRO_TRN SET DT_DATE_OF_INVESTIGATION=?,STR_NATURE_OF_INVESTIGATION=?,STR_INVESTIGATED_BY_OFFICER=?,STR_OUTCOME_OF_PROCEEDINGS=?,NUM_ACTION_ID=?,GNUM_ISVALID=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE STR_COMPLAINT_NUMBER=? and gnum_hospital_code=?
UPDATE PISVIG_CASE_REG_TRN SET STR_CASE_STATUS=2 WHERE STR_COMPLAINT_NUMBER=? and gnum_hospital_code=? and GNUM_ISVALID=1
UPDATE PISVIG_CASE_PRO_TRN A SET A.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE A.STR_COMPLAINT_NUMBER=? and A.gnum_hospital_code=? and GNUM_ISVALID=1
UPDATE PISVIG_CASE_REG_TRN SET STR_CASE_STATUS=1 WHERE STR_COMPLAINT_NUMBER=? and gnum_hospital_code=? and GNUM_ISVALID=1
